segments.advisor_message: So, can you tell me a bit about your job? I mean, like what do you do exactly?
segments.client_message: Oh, right! I work, um, in marketing, kinda like a coordinator? You know, manage campaigns and all that jazz. It's busy, haha!

segments.advisor_message: That sounds interesting! Do you find it takes a lot of your time?
segments.client_message: Yeah, totally! Some days, I feel like I'm just drowning in emails and calls, but, uh, it’s fun at the same time. And, um, it pays pretty well, I guess?
